name: Horse Simulator - Wild Animal Riding Simulation Game to enjoy in Real 3D Farm Fields
name_original: Horse Simulator - Wild Animal Riding Simulation Game to enjoy in Real 3D Farm Fields
description:
Get into the mountain fields with your horse and let’s ride! For those who love horse riding it’s time to be a perfect jockey to ride your own virtual horse. Tame it to be your farm animal & feed him as well. Horse Simulator 3D is a horse riding game with two different modes to get crazy on the farm fields. Make your horse jump, trot and run. You love playing horse games and other simulators? Let’s run, jump hurdles, eat carrots and explore a wide map all around to complete different missions.

Horse Simulator 3D is filled with interactive sounds and amazing horse simulation. The challenging mode has various missions for you. Jump over hurdles, fill appetite with carrots and cause destruction as well.

So step up and be a horse rider to play this free 3D simulation & running game on your smartphones and make horse your favorite pet animal.

***** GAME FEATURES *****

• Free & Challenge Mode Horse Riding
• Jumping over hurdles, Hitting Trees, Eating Carrots
• Learn to a Jockey and Tame your Horse
• 3D horse Simulator Ride
• Different Horses to Choose from
• Amazing Farm Environment and Gameplay sounds
